text: Ohe yara imana enecha! Nihsandeha panditadera o sann'yasidera madhyera aneke lokera dhanasampatti an'yayabhabe galadhahkarana kare ara allahâ€Œra patha theke phiriye rakhe. Bastutah yara sona o rupa punjibhuta kare athaca allahâ€Œra pathe kharaca kare na, tadera tahale sambada da'o marmantuda sastira
